name: Servant of the Unsated God
description: The Servant of the Unsated God is an undead creature that embodies the vile hunger and malice of its dark deity, featuring a shadowy appearance and stench.
memorable: It has the ability to deal necrotic damage that ignores resistances and is particularly dangerous in the dark.
goals: To serve its dark deity and unleash terror upon adventurers.
relations: Could be encountered with other undead or dark followers of its deity.
environment: Usually found in darker areas or locations that align with its malevolent purpose.
strengths: Can deal necrotic damage that bypasses resistances and possesses diverse spellcasting abilities.
weaknesses: Disadvantage in sunlight, limiting its effectiveness during the day.
attacks: Multiattack with bite and mace, inflicting piercing and necrotic damage, alongside a stench that poisons nearby foes.
most_powerful_ability: Inescapable Hunger allows its necrotic damage to ignore any resistance.
equipment: Mace of the Devourer, imbued with necrotic power.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet and passive perception of 13, making it adept in low-light conditions.
skills: Possesses good proficiency in deception and stealth, enhancing its role as a cunning adversary.
additional_information: Immune to poison and conditions such as being charmed or exhausted.
Can fire a Light Crossbow for ranged attacks.
Utilizes spells like Inflict Wounds and Hold Person for added combat versatility.
Able to contract darakhul fever with its bite, introducing an additional layer of threat.
Can poison creatures that start their turn nearby with its Stench ability.
spellcasting: 4th-level spellcaster with access to various cleric spells for control and damage.
